title: Interpretation of seeing stones in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A single person’s vision of stones differs from that of a married woman, and in this article we will explain the different interpretations of seeing stones in a dream. Interpretation of seeing stones by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if he sees in a dream a lot of stones and pebbles falling from the sky above his head and he does not find a place to protect himself from these Stones, this is evidence that the person who had the vision is committing many sins and there is God’s wrath upon him. This vision is a sign for him and that he must repent for the sin and return to the straight path. But if he sees himself eating stones or hitting them, then water comes out of them, and whoever sees the vision drinks from That water, this is a sign of goodness and abundance of livelihood. Interpretation of seeing stones for single women: If an unmarried girl sees that she is being bombarded with large stones and is unable to defend herself or escape, this indicates that there are many enemies surrounding her and conspiring against her. But if the woman sees that she is not If a married woman dreams that she collects a lot of stones and enters her house, then this is evidence that she will soon marry a good man and will be happy with him. Interpretation of seeing stones for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she picks up stones and counts them, then the stones she picks indicate the number of children she will have. If a married woman sees that she Collecting a lot of black stones, this indicates an increase in livelihood. But if a woman sees white stones in her dream, this is evidence that her relationship with her husband will strengthen and the love between them will increase, and if there are disagreements between her and her husband, they will be resolved and her family will do so. Enjoy love. Interpretation of seeing stones for a pregnant woman: Seeing stones in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates goodness in all circumstances. If a pregnant woman sees that she is collecting stones, this may mean that her birth will be easy. Interpretation of seeing stones for a man: If an unmarried man sees himself in a dream collecting stones and building A house or a small place for shelter, this is evidence that he will marry a good woman. But if a person sees that he is throwing many stones from a high mountain, this indicates that he carries many worries and that God will relieve him of his worries and improve his conditions. For those who have a vision and want to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end. The article is on the Shamloul website.

title: Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream: Strawberries are a promising fruit in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that you are eating red strawberries means expanding your chest and removing worries from your heart. Interpretation of seeing strawberries: The only sign indicates her future marriage, as well as the fulfillment of her desire in life. Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of a dream about red strawberries, which is: Marrying an unmarried young man who has never been married before. If the strawberries are green, it means that many good things are coming your way, perhaps it symbolizes money. Yellow strawberries are not good because yellow indicates illness. Black strawberries are a sign of your heart that holds hatred For many people. Ibn Sirin said that black strawberries can also indicate anxiety. And collecting strawberry fruits in a dream is success in life. Interpretations of a dream about red strawberries. Interpretation of a vision: red strawberries and collecting fruits, this indicates success. If you collect fruits very quickly, the success you will achieve It will be easy without difficulties, while you collect red strawberries with great difficulty, and this indicates the success that you have after the suffering and obstacles that you find in front of you. Interpretation of a dream about strawberries for a married woman. Buying strawberries in a dream means that a married woman will achieve the things she strived for. Buying strawberries and it was expensive The price reaches what you want but after many obstacles you overcome. Eating strawberries is a sign of pregnancy for a married woman and strawberries mean a woman. By giving strawberries, they get good things from a generous person or someone who has an excellent status. Interpretation of a dream about strawberries for a pregnant woman. She dreamed of strawberries For a pregnant woman who is suffering from an illness, this is good news that she will recover. The interpretation of seeing strawberries without knowing the sex of the fetus means that what is in her stomach is a beautiful girl. Eating strawberries means that her pregnancy is healthy and the fetus is healthy. Buying strawberries is good news that her birth is easy and smooth, God willing. Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a man’s dream. Strawberries in a man’s dream means sustenance, especially monetary sustenance. Buying strawberries means that you will achieve great benefits and profits in business. The fruit of an unmarried young man means a beautiful girl or a beautiful woman. It is not good to eat immature strawberries because this is harmful. With your wife or between your family and your work. Seeing a lot of strawberries on Rizk Highway. A married man who has not yet had children. Strawberries are the news of his wife’s pregnancy. Interpretation of eating strawberries in a dream for a married woman. Fruit dreams. Strawberries are among the dreams that show goodness and blessing. If a married woman dreams that she is eating strawberries, This is a sign of weakness and breast enlargement. If she has children, this is evidence of their good condition and that they will be fair to her and help her in this world. If she does not have children, this is evidence of the imminence of pregnancy after a long wait. It also portends eating strawberries to treat illness and remove negligence from the heart. Interpretation of a dream Rotten strawberriesRotten strawberries in a dream symbolize enemies or envious people and haters. Seeing rotten strawberries in a dream indicates a warning about...

title: Interpretation of a dream about catching a wolf in a dream by Ibn Sirin, which means seeing wolves

preview.html: Ibn Sirin hit the wolf in a dream. The indication that the dreamer defeated the wolf in his dream is victory over the enemies who wanted to defeat them. The loss of crises and family problems that the dreamer is going through in his life, and God knows best. I saw in my dream that I collided with a large wolf, which is a sign of victory and overcoming the enemy, as well as foretelling With success and progress in your life. I am sick and I saw a wolf being beaten in a dream, which indicates an improvement in my health and recovery. Interpretation of seeing a wolf in a dream by Ibn Sirin: I dreamed that a wolf was chasing me and walking behind me in a dream, so the vision indicates that I suffer from anxiety and a feeling of constant tension. About the hypocrites And the deceivers in your life and your work environment. I dreamed of a wolf attacking me in a dream. I was very afraid, and it symbolizes a cunning enemy waiting for his chance to tell you and bring you to the ground. A wolf attack in the dreamer’s dream is an enemy that causes crises and problems for you and harms you. Seeing someone bitten by a wolf in a dream means unpleasant and hurtful words to the dreamer. This causes him a bad psychological state. A wolf bite in a dream indicates the occurrence of a disaster or bad opinion that may land him in prison as a result of false testimony against him. I dreamed that a wolf bit me in a dream indicates problems with the family and you may run away and leave them behind. Interpretation of a dream about a wolf bite in a dream indicates that It is one of the visions that is not popular with interpreters, because it carries meanings of evil, betrayal, and theft for the dreamer. The bite of a wolf in a dream symbolizes imprisonment and that he will be imprisoned, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. I saw a wolf bit me in a dream, but the place of the bite is recovering, and it expresses the end and end of disputes in your environment that You are in it, and so is your exposure to illness. Interpretation of a dream about a group of wolves A flock of wolves in a dream expresses the dreamer’s distance from God in reality. Dreaming about many wolves is a sign that the presence of some people causes evil and harm to the dreamer. It symbolizes weak faith and a warning from God. Then It expresses that the dreamer has two faces when dealing with people and hides his true face from them. It indicates that the dreamer is exposed to material losses, as it can lead to crises and problems that he faces. The opinion is exposed to several judgments and disagreements that are difficult to escape from and to feelings of anxiety. Being struck by a wolf in a dream for an unmarried woman. I saw a wolf in my dream White, which indicates the presence of a treacherous and deceitful man who is trying to fall for her. An indication of the crises and disagreements that she is going through in her life. The lone wolf hitting the wolf in the dream is evidence of the end and the disappearance of disputes from her life. Then she struck the wolf in the dream as a victory over the hypocrites in her life. I saw it in my dream That a large wolf had been beaten is a sign of recovery and improved health. I dreamed that I was killing a wolf. Killing a wolf in a dream symbolizes the loss of a loved one who was offering you a helping hand. Gaining status and high status in the dreamer’s life. Then the dreamer received criticism in his work environment and saw What he does at work. Solutions to the problems and crises that the dreamer will face. Evidence of the dreamer’s bad psychological state and a period of distress and sadness, and God knows best. Seeing a white wolf in a dream indicates a close person or friend, but it is deceptive and malicious and does not

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a ring in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ring in a dream: Whoever was in a position of moment, whoever sees that he has worn a silver ring and placed it where he wants and is allowed, then he will be afflicted with power. Whoever sees that it is sealed with the seal of the Caliph, and he is from Banu Hashim or from the Arabs, then he will command a great matter. If he sees this outside, he has obtained an invalid order. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing peanuts Interpretation of a dream about a ring in a dream Whoever finds a ring has obtained money from a non-Arab, or has a child, or gets married. As for the ring, it shows what he has and what he is capable of. Whoever gave a ring or bought it or gave it as a gift and then acquired the authority of a king or his kingdom if he was one of his people. Because King Solomon, peace be upon him, had it in his ring, and likewise kings print their books and their nobles their treasures. The king may have a house in which he lives and he enters it or owns it. He separates it from her door, or it may be a woman whom he marries, and she is infallible, or he cuts her ring, or puts his belly in it. And his face is her face, and taking the ring from Almighty God for the ascetic pilgrim may be safe from Almighty God. From evil to the end. And he took it from the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, or from a scholar, good news for the acquisition of knowledge, and all of this was not a silver ring. If it was gold, then it is not good for it, and the same applies if it was made of iron because it is an adornment of the people of Hell, or of copper. Because of the word “Nex” in his name. Whatever the rings of the jinn, we seek refuge in God from all evil. It has been said: The ring also refers to the father and wife, or the purchase of a maid, or a house, or an animal, or money, or guardianship, and if it is of gold, then it is for the man. And they said: Whoever sees that he is wearing an iron ring, it will show him good things, that he will be rewarded after fatigue, and if it is of gold and has a ring. It is dangerous. Empty and solid rings are not good at all, and explosive rings containing filling materials indicate murder and cunning, because something is hidden inside them. Or they indicate hope for something terrible and many benefits because their bones are greater than their weight. As for horn or ivory rings, they are worth Praise for women. Interpretation of seeing a ring lost. Whoever sees in a dream that his ring has been lost, lost, or stolen from him, his vision indicates humiliation and loss of work arrangement or authority by the owner of the vision. Losing a link indicates tension and insecurity with the other side. Interpretation of seeing a ring BrokenThe interpretation of a dream about a broken ring in a dream indicates that evil is approaching them, and breaking the ring is a sign of the dreamer’s assurance that evil will go away from him. Also, seeing a broken ring in a dream indicates divorce, completing an engagement, or losing the emotional bond for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a ring for single womenInterpretation Seeing an unmarried woman’s ring in a dream is good for her because she will soon be connected to a specific person in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a gold ring for an unmarried woman in a dream, indicating that she will not communicate with this person. Seeing a silver ring on the right hand of an unmarried woman is a sign of A short marriage. A ring studded with precious stones in a dream indicates an unmarried woman’s relationship with a wealthy man of high standing. Seeing a broken wedding ring

title: Interpretation of a hand injury in a dream: My hand was injured in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of a wound on the hand of an unmarried girl, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, either a deep wound on the hand or in the palm of the right or left hand, seeing Ibn Sirin’s injured hand. And others: Injury to the hand, forearm, palm, and fingers in a dream, if you see in your dream that a wound has fallen on your hand, the palm of the hand, or one of its fingers, such as the index finger, the little finger, or the little finger. Interpretation of a hand wound in a dream If one dreams that he has a wound on his hand, this means that if The wound on the right hand indicates that money comes from a family member, and the wound on the left indicates money from the women of the family. Whoever dreams that there are wounds and ulcers on his hands, the same amount forbidden from him will affect him unless it is on his neck, as it is a debt and trust owed to him. A wound on the hand in a dream indicates spending large sums of money or mismanagement of expenses, especially if the wound on the hand or forearm bleeds profusely or oozes blood. A wound on the hand also indicates financial risks such as unprofitable investments, loss in the market or sale. Blood in this context can symbolize a warning or a warning against this dangerous process that could lead to a major financial loss - God forbid - and this interpretation or interpretation occurs is the businessman, trader and speculator in the financial market, as well as those who work in the investment sector. Interpretation of a dream about wounds in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of pigeons in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of pigeons in a dream: Pigeons are one of the most beautiful birds that are a symbol of peace and security for all of humanity. Interpretation of pigeons in a dream for someone married to Ibn Sirin, and it has many interpretations. Interpretation of bathing in a dream by Ibn Sirin: When a person sees a nest of pigeons in his dream, this dream is an indication of the differences that exist between married couples. Seeing pigeon eggs in a nest is evidence that the dreamer will receive a lot of money. Seeing a black dove in a dream indicates that there are many difficult disputes between an aristocratic person and his family. When a person sees in a dream that he is entering black pigeons into a house, this dream indicates that he He will hear sad news and it is also considered evidence of divorce between married people. Seeing a black dove in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that this girl is suffering from many problems, and this vision is also evidence that there is a reckless young man seeking to marry this girl and he must beware of him. Hearing the sound of doves Black in a dream is a sign of extreme poverty. Seeing someone chasing black pigeons in a dream means that the dreamer has committed a crime punishable by law. Dreaming of a large group of small pigeons is a sign of hearing good news, but when you see that you are catching them, then this dream is A sign of getting a lot of money. When you take a bath in a dream, this dream indicates marriage to someone. But eating pigeon eggs is a sign of a lot of money and the dreamer entering into a big project soon. Interpretation of a bath in a dream for a single girlWhen you see an unmarried woman In her dream that she raises pigeons in her house in a good way, this is evidence of the goodness that will come to this girl soon, God willing. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is bathing for a long time, this is evidence of food and goodness that will happen to her, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream The white cat in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women. The interpretation of seeing a pigeon in a dream for a married woman. After we discovered the interpretation of a pigeon in a dream for an unmarried girl, we also need to know the interpretation of a dream about bathing in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is taking a cooked bath, this is a sign of goodness and living What this woman and her family will receive. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is preparing food, and there is a large bathroom in it, and this food is brought to her husband, this is evidence of the good that this woman is the cause of, God willing. Uniting her with her husband with love, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream for a divorced woman. When a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is preparing a lot of pigeon food, this is a sign of wealth and goodness that will happen to her in a short time. When a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is preparing a stuffed pigeon and then eating it, this is Evidence that they are almost connected, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream for a man: When a man dreams that he is eating delicious stuffed pigeons, this dream is a sign of the wealth and goodness that a person will obtain. If one sees in a dream

Seeing a black dove in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that this girl is suffering from many problems, and this vision is also evidence that there is a reckless young man seeking to marry this girl and he must beware of him. Hearing the sound of doves Black in a dream is a sign of extreme poverty. Seeing someone chasing black pigeons in a dream means that the dreamer has committed a crime punishable by law. Dreaming of a large group of small pigeons is a sign of hearing good news, but when you see that you are catching them, then this dream is A sign of getting a lot of money. When you take a bath in a dream, this dream indicates marriage to someone. But eating pigeon eggs is a sign of a lot of money and the dreamer entering into a big project soon. Interpretation of a bath in a dream for a single girlWhen you see an unmarried woman In her dream that she raises pigeons in her house in a good way, this is evidence of the goodness that will come to this girl soon, God willing. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is bathing for a long time, this is evidence of food and goodness that will happen to her, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream The white cat in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women. The interpretation of seeing a pigeon in a dream for a married woman. After we discovered the interpretation of a pigeon in a dream for an unmarried girl, we also need to know the interpretation of a dream about bathing in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is taking a cooked bath, this is a sign of goodness and living What this woman and her family will receive. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is preparing food, and there is a large bathroom in it, and this food is brought to her husband, this is evidence of the good that this woman is the cause of, God willing. Uniting her with her husband with love, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream for a divorced woman. When a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is preparing a lot of pigeon food, this is a sign of wealth and goodness that will happen to her in a short time. When a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is preparing a stuffed pigeon and then eating it, this is Evidence that they are almost connected, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream for a man: When a man dreams that he is eating delicious stuffed pigeons, this dream is a sign of the wealth and goodness that a person will obtain. title: Interpretation of seeing or going to Umrah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of Umrah by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: Whoever dreams of Hajj or Umrah, he will go to visit the Sacred House of God in reality, God willing. Seeing the point of Umrah in a dream indicates the dreamer’s long life for the pioneer and the enjoyment of blessings, health and success in all aspects of his life. Likewise, dreaming of Umrah and seeing it in The dream indicates the abundance of sustenance, blessings, and many good things that God Almighty bestows on the dreamer in his life. This vision also indicates that the dreamer’s condition has changed significantly for the better and that the Gulf is near. And the end of worry, God willing. What if the fortuneteller is a young, unmarried man? This vision appears. His imminent marriage to a pious girl of morals, honor and purity. If the dreamer is burdened with debts and experiencing serious financial difficulties, then this vision portends the imminent payment of his debts and his financial situation will improve significantly. It indicates abundance and good luck. Going for Umrah in a dreamSee the intention to go for UmrahIn the dream he intends The dreamer must repent for his addiction to disobedience and transgressions. It also indicates his desire to approach God with honesty and sincerity. And if one sees in a dream that he is packing his things to go to Umrah, this is a sign that he will fulfill many of the wishes that he dreamed of in his life in the very near future. This vision may indicate the dreamer’s intention to enter into a new project or commercial agreement, as this is an indication that he will meet with success and success, God willing. This vision symbolizes the dreamer’s intention to volunteer to do charitable work and help others in resolving their crises. Interpretation of seeing Umrah in a dream for a single woman. Seeing Umrah indicates In a dream for single people, many positive changes will appear that will change their situation for the better in every way. It symbolizes sight. Umrah. In the dream of single people, it means starting a new business and establishing many beneficial and beneficial social relationships. If an unmarried girl sees herself performing Umrah in a dream, this is a sign that she will get married. A good, God-fearing man will soon meet her in the very near future. What if he sees a girl in her dream performing Umrah and drinking Zamzam water, this is evidence of her imminent marriage to a man who has a high social status and good morals. Interpretation of a dream about Umrah for a married woman. Seeing Umrah for a married woman in the blessing that fills her life, abundance. The livelihood and stability in which she lives with her husband and children. This vision also indicates that she will get rid of all the problems that have plagued her life recently. This vision also indicates the approaching carrying of the banner. What if he sees a married woman in her dream performing Umrah rituals, and this is evidence that her circumstances It will be good and her life will change for the better. A dream about Umrah with the family. If one sees in a dream that he is performing Umrah with his family, this is evidence of the extent of the family bond between the members of that family and that they live a peaceful and stable life. This vision shows the blessing that fills their lives and that they are always obedient to God and that their lives are free From the whispers of Satan. This vision symbolizes the dreamer’s enjoyment of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a loved one drowning in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone drowning in a dream is different meanings of drowning, so we learn in the following lines the interpretation of a dream about someone drowning in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about a dear person drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a dear person drowning in a dream could be a sign that the journey has stopped, and God knows best. While Some interpretation scholars have reported that seeing a loved one drowning in a dream may indicate earning money, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees someone he loves drowning in a dream, this may mean that his travels will stop for days, and God knows best. When you see someone you love drowning in a dream, it may represent money. What the dreamer gains, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of an animal drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of an animal drowning in a dream, and animals drowning can indicate bad things, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees an animal drowning in a dream, this may be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. If a married man sees Himself saving a fish in a dream, this may be a sign of good news, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone drowning in a flood in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone drowning in a flood in a dream could be a sign that you have fallen into temptation, and God knows the unseen. When you see him drowning in a flood in A dream may mean losing his glory, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself drowning in a torrent in a dream, it may express a disagreement in religion, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen drowning in a torrent, this may lead to the corruption of her household, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband drowning in a dream. Interpretation A dream about my ex-husband drowning in a dream could indicate problems, and God knows the unseen. Whereas if a divorced woman sees her ex-husband drowning in clean water, this may lead to good news, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see yourself drowning in clear water in a dream, this could be Evidence of achieving goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also express happiness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a workplace being flooded in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a workplace being flooded in a dream. Perhaps we did not find specific meanings for it among scholars, but seeing yourself drowning in a dream could be a sign of crises, and God knows best. What you see A married man drowning in a dream may be a sign of sadness, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl drowning in a dream, she may have been convicted, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a sister’s house sinking in a dream. If the dreamer sees the death of a sister drowning in a dream, then it may be a sign of marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about drowning. The sister’s house in a dream can lead to trouble, and God knows best. When you see your sister’s house drowning in a dream, this may indicate the dangers that surround it, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the sister drowning and crying over her in a dream, it may be a sign of judgments, and God is Most High and Knows. Interpretation of a dream about a stranger who drowned and died. In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about a stranger who died by drowning in a dream. Perhaps death by drowning indicates enemies, and God is All-Knowing, as it may indicate enemies who are planning to resurrect him, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself drowning in a dream, this may be evidence.

title: Interpretation of a dream about gray hair and white hair in a dream for a married woman and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Seeing gray hair in a dream for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, divorced for a man, for a man, if I dreamed of my hair, a young man who bleached the front of the head in the beard according to Imam Al-Sadiq by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen and more interpretations in the continuation of the topic below. Gray hair in a dream it indicates On the prestige of youth, because it indicates the dreamer’s long life. Gray indicates dignity, and indicates weakness if it is in a man’s beard. It indicates longevity and maintenance. He who has a new head and is pregnant has a male child. If a woman sees gray hair on her head, her husband will be successful or happy. Gray body hair for the rich is a loss. For money, for poor men there is debt, gray hair for a sick person means his death and his shroud, gray hair for a frightened person means security, and for someone who is not married to him. It is a marriage, and a pregnant woman has a male child. On the other hand, it can indicate weakness or show poverty if the dreamer sees it spread on his beard and hair. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his hair is young and his wife is pregnant, it means that he will give birth to a son. If the dreamer has a lot of money And he sees gray hair on his body, it means that he will lose his money, and if a poor person sees white hair on his body, it means that he owes him a debt that he cannot repay. If the dreamer is sick and sees gray hair in a dream, it means that he will die. If the dreamer is afraid, then gray hair in His dream is security for him, but if the woman is the dreamer and she sees gray hair, then this is interpreted as meaning that bad words are said against her or it may indicate divorce. If you see that your hair is long white in the dream, this symbolizes that you will live a long time, just as white hair symbolizes Aging. A dream about gray hair does not seem to bring good news, as according to some interpreters it indicates death and approaching. Gray hair can be a sign of an illness or infection affecting a family member or close friend. If you see in a dream that your hair contains a mixture of your natural hair color and hair. Gray or grey, it means that in your real life you will fall between two choices and that your choice will have an impact on your future and the well-being of your life. The dream tends to warn that you will make a wrong decision that will lead to your loss if you do not make an effort to make the right decision. If you dream of a woman with hair Gray, so be careful, because your dream carries a warning that a hostile woman will enter your family life to kidnap your husband or fiancée. White hair symbolizes old age and carries a sign that you are a wise person and have the experience and ability to solve a problem that worries you in an appropriate manner. White hair in a dream symbolizes death in the family Or the spread of a certain disease in it. White hair in a dream symbolizes poverty and warns you of your bad financial circumstances. White hair is a reverence for whoever sees it. If you dream that your hair is white, this indicates that you will obtain a high position in your environment or in your work. An old woman symbolizes To life, so anyone who sees an old woman in a dream shows his life path. If she is well-groomed and beautiful, then this is a sign of the good conduct of his life, and if she is ugly and unkempt, then this is an indication of the difficulties that await him in the future.
